title: ABD Structure Report Schema v0.1
description: Schema for Stage 2 structure_report.json â€” summary statistics and flags for human review.

pass_stats.description: Statistics from each pass of the three-pass algorithm.

pass1_html_tagged.description: Number of divisions found by Pass 1 (HTML-tagged headings).

pass1_5_toc_entries.description: Number of TOC entries parsed (0 if no TOC detected).

pass2_keyword_candidates.description: Number of keyword candidates found by Pass 2 before dedup.

pass2_after_dedup.description: Number of new divisions from Pass 2 after deduplication with Pass 1.

pass3_llm_discovered.description: Number of new divisions discovered by Pass 3 (LLM).

pass3_confirmed.description: Number of Pass 1/2 candidates confirmed by Pass 3.

pass3_rejected.description: Number of Pass 1/2 candidates rejected by Pass 3 as false positives.

pass3_llm_calls.description: Total LLM API calls made during Pass 3.

division_stats.description: Statistics about the final division tree.

max_depth.description: Maximum depth of the division tree.

by_detection_method.description: Count of divisions per detection method.

by_confidence.description: Count of divisions per confidence level.

by_type.description: Count of divisions per structural keyword type.

heading_density.description: Total divisions / total pages. Gives a sense of structural richness.

review_summary.description: Summary of items flagged for human review.

flagged_items.description: List of all flagged items for the human reviewer.

toc_cross_reference.description: Results of cross-referencing TOC entries against discovered divisions. null if no TOC detected.

toc_entries_unmatched.description: TOC entries that could not be matched to any discovered division (possible missed headings).

divisions_not_in_toc.description: Division IDs not found in the TOC (possible false positives or sub-sections not in TOC).
